Title: Archive
Text:
Retrieved in... Current Progress 19%... 46%... 78%... 99%...

Sound source has been located at a frequency consistent with the imported data.
The sound source belongs to, Spectrum report RA1819-G.
Subject's name: Qianxin
Profile: HuanglongJinzhou person, naturally awakened Resonator, resonance history 5 years, sings to calm others' disturbed frequencies, strengthens other ResonatorForte within a certain time frame without causing loss to the person being strengthened.
He used to be a resident singer at Jinzhou Theater, and was known as "The Mockingbird of the Dusk", covering the songs "Summer Cicada Whispering Ice", "Ballad of the Sky", and "Ballad of a Thousand Stars". She later joined the folk team formed by Ichor and Irv to help the Midnight Rangers resist the TD wave. Suspected Forte failure due to collaborating with the squad in a supply support operation on the north side of Midnight Rangers.
No update information recorded at this time.

Archived: This frequency correspondent is currently "missing" and cannot be contacted.
